sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.DeleteUpdateSetEntryAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Ajax helper class for helping the Deleting UI action on Update Set Entries</description>
        <name>DeleteUpdateSetEntryAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DeleteUpdateSetEntryAjax = Class.create();

DeleteUpdateSetEntryAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    deleteEntries: function() {
        var updateXmlGR = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
        if (!GlideSecurityManager.tableLevelACLAllow(updateXmlGR, 'delete'))
            return false;
        
        var entries = this.getParameter('sysparm_entry_ids');
        var sysIds  = entries.split(",");
        var i = 0;
        while(updateXmlGR.get(sysIds[i])) {
			if (updateXmlGR.canDelete())
				updateXmlGR.deleteRecord();
			
			i++;
        }
        return true;
    },
    
    toString: function() { return 'DeleteUpdateSetEntryAjax'; }
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2011-08-02 18:56:51</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5aebb4301f101000dada97c0ed8b70b6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DeleteUpdateSetEntryAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Version Support" source="com.glideapp.version">86dc70c36d2220100acb70b353433010</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5aebb4301f101000dada97c0ed8b70b6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-09-08 17:53:10</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>689</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
